subject: Re: [junit] Can I test web application using JUnit?
msgSnippet: ... I would suggest qualifying that statement.  I have been a part of 5 large projects now that have all used the Servlet technology.  Not a single one of
messageBody:
On Mon, 2003-09-22 at 05:35, Narendra S wrote:
> If u are interested in testing the servlets try Cactus
> http://jakarta.apache.org/cactus/index.html
> ----- Original Message -----

I would suggest qualifying that statement. I have been a part of 5
large projects now that have all used the Servlet technology. Not a
single one of those projects needed the overhead of Cactus. In fact, I
am not sure what the benefit of it is. (That is not a derogatory
remark.) Can you sum up the things that Cactus brings to the table over
JUnit+HTTPUnit or JUnit+HTMLUnit?

=jason
